title: COMPANY detail page Â» BRANDS
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want to know all the BRANDS that belong to a specific COMPANY\
So I can get an idea about the scope and size of their operation
description:
* The COMPANY detail page contains a section with a list of all connected BRANDS.
* Each BRAND in the list is presented with its name and primary information.
* Each BRAND in the list contains a link to its detail page.
* Each BRAND in the list has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no BRAND connected to the COMPANY then the section is not displayed at all.
